article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YrilXf hentry entry story-marquee-standard

h2.a: Dragonflies Are Awesome

div.p: Dragonflies look dainty, glittery and fun, like a bubble bath or costume jewelry. Yet they are also voracious aerial predators, and new research suggests they may well be the most brutally effective hunters in the animal kingdom.

div.p: Barbie doll prices vary by job, with only a moderate relation to actual salaries.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16qIveD hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: WILL NEVER REPLACE THEIR OWN BULLSH*T

h2.a: Wall Street's New Drug Of Choice

div.p: Modafinil was first approved by the FDA in 1998 for the treatment of narcolepsy, but since then it's become better known as a nootropic, a "smart drug," especially among entrepreneurs.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10sqqIU hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: What KKK Member Elwin Wilson Learned Before He Died

div.p: On Monday Elwin Wilson, a reformed Ku Klux Klansman, will be laid to rest. His life was notable for the hate therein — cross burnings, cantaloupe throwing, and, most famously, the beating of John Lewis — until around four years ago, when Wilson began apologizing, making his history, after he died last week, worth another look.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Yrjdeh hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Hypocrisy Of Miss USA's Code of Conduct

div.p: The men who run the Miss USA pageants aren't held to the same narrow-minded standards as the young women who compete in them.

h2.a: Apparently Cadbury Crème Eggs Contain Traces Of Beaver Butts

div.p: Put down the leftover Easter candy.

h2.a: Apple And The Mysterious Case Of The Missing Moonshot

h2.a: How Astronauts Work Out In Space

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZWgRDz hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: WHAT'S THE OPPOSITE OF FINE DINING?

h2.a: Eating Easter Dinner In An Egyptian Slum

div.p: "When a man I met Friday invited me to his family's home for Sunday dinner, it was an exceptionally uncommon offer. When the invitation turned out to be in Dar el-Salam, one of Egypt's most poverty stricken areas, Easter afternoon turned into a once-in-lifetime affair."

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YOuXqQ hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Expert: Recent Attacks On Justice Community 'Really Unprecedented'

div.p: Two county prosecutors fatally shot in Texas. Colorado's top prison official gunned down. And a dozen more members of the U.S. justice community — ranging from police to judges — victims of targeted killings since the beginning of the decade.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZVU4rv hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: BUT DO THEY LOOK LIKE KERI RUSSELL?

h2.a: Mexican Drug Cartels Sending Top Agents To Live And Work In The U.S.

div.p: Mexican drug cartels whose operatives once rarely ventured beyond the U.S. border are dispatching some of their most trusted agents to live and work deep inside the United States — an emboldened presence that experts believe is meant to tighten their grip on the world's most lucrative narcotics market.

div.p: The answer to whether or not we are alone in the universe could be right under our nose, or, more literally, inside every cell in our body.

h2.a: Why Do We Hate Certain Words?

div.p: It’s about to get really moist in here. But first, some background is in order. The phenomenon of word aversion—seemingly pedestrian, inoffensive words driving some people up the wall—has garnered increasing attention over the past decade or so.
